backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing marketplace logic with products, orders, user profiles, carts, categories, and access‑controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing pages, components, and requirements linked to mobile app packaging and TWA guidance updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including components, pages, hooks, styles, and manifest metadata.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark OKLCH color palettes and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the app with favicon, manifest, theme color, and main script.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Template Digital Asset Links file requiring replacement of package name and SHA‑256 fingerprint.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.R: Documentation explaining how to configure Digital Asset Links for Trusted Web Activity setup.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining icons, theme colors, metadata, and Play Store screenshots.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with gradient styling and reconnect prompt.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker that caches core assets, updates caches on install/activate, and handles fetches with network-first logic and offline fallbacks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the application's layout and client-side routing using TanStack Router and wraps the app in theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Protects routes by checking authentication and shows a login prompt when the user is not signed in.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays footer links, branding, and attribution with dynamic year and referral link handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main navigation bar with logo, search, cart, auth controls, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles login and logout actions via Internet Identity with UI feedback and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing products, managing state for fields like name, description, price, stock, category, and image.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: A modal form prompting new authenticated users to enter name, email, and seller status, then saving the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, products, categories, cart actions, and other backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color themes, typography, and common layout utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's order history with loading skeletons and order cards, wrapped in an AuthGuard.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, merges products with cart items, allows quantity updates, and shows subtotal with navigation to continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows a checkout form, validates shipping details, calculates totals, and submits an order before redirecting to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders a homepage with hero content, featured products, and category browsing sourced from product and category queries.
frontend/src/pages/InstallAppPage.tsx: Provides step-by-step instructions for installing the PWA on mobile devices and links to the packaging guide.
frontend/src/pages/MobileAppPackagingGui: Explains how to package the site as a mobile app, includes metadata fields, and supports copying configuration values.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Loads and displays order confirmation details, including shipping info and links to order details or further shopping.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific order, including items, status, and product details, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the application's privacy policy content using styled cards and sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information with add-to-cart functionality, handling loading, authentication, and errors.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all active products with search, category, and price filtering, using client-side filtering logic.
frontend/src/pages/SellerDashboardPage.t: Provides sellers with tools to manage their products, including creating, editing, and deactivating listings.
frontend/src/pages/SupportContactPage.ts: Renders the Support & Contact page with email support, business address placeholders, and safety reporting info using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Displays the Terms of Service with sections outlining user agreements, account requirements, and policy details using card components.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides an async helper to copy text to the clipboard with graceful failure handling.
frontend/src/utils/siteOrigin.ts: Returns the current site origin, falling back to a default domain during SSR.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project status, requirements, architecture notes, and implemented features for the marketplace app.
